channel.title: Simple problem, but i cant figure it out
channel.description:
well im making a dungeoneering skill its going pretty good but how would i make it so you can buy items with the tokens the monsters drop? would i use prices.text? ive tried a few things and cant get it. Help would be nice
Also how would i make it so when you craft runes you also get 1 token? same question but with a diffrent way of obtaining you would get like example: 23 nats and 1 token instead of just 23 nats. Thx

item.title: Simple problem, but i cant figure it out
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

yes but where would the ability to code that be located!

Read full topic
item.source: Simple problem, but i cant figure it out

item.title: Simple problem, but i cant figure it out
item.dc:creator: @SecondHeat SecondHeat
item.description:
@SecondHeat wrote:

You could always make it so you buy the item by talking to npc. So when you have 1 token he gives you your runes or whatever then he takes your token away.

Read full topic

Either one, not realy sure.
